j.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • j.util.Util

  • public final class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Misc utilities.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Random getRandom()
      Gets a thread-local Random object.
      static void shuffle(char[] array)
      Shuffle method for a primitive char array.
      static void shuffle(int[] array)
      Shuffle method for a primitive int array.
      static <T> void shuffle(T[] array)
      Shuffles an array in-place with each possible permutation having an equal chance of being the outcome.
      static <T> void shuffle(T[] array, int start, int end)
      Shuffles a contiguous part of an array in-place, with each possible permutation having an equal chance of being the outcome.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandom

        public static java.util.Random getRandom()
        Gets a thread-local Random object.

      • shuffle

        public static <T> void shuffle(T[] array)
        Shuffles an array in-place with each possible permutation having an equal chance of being the outcome.
        Parameters:
        array - This array typically should contain only unique elements.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if array is null
        See Also:
        Fisher-Yates shuffle

      • shuffle

        public static <T> void shuffle(T[] array,
               int start,
               int end)
        Shuffles a contiguous part of an array in-place, with each possible permutation having an equal chance of being the outcome.
        Parameters:
        array - This array typically should contain only unique elements.
        start - Zero-based index of the first element, inclusive.
        end - Zero-based index of the last element, inclusive.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if array is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if end is lesser than start
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if start or end is out of bounds
        See Also:
        Fisher-Yates shuffle

      • shuffle

        public static void shuffle(int[] array)
        Shuffle method for a primitive int array. A specialized method is required as no method can accept any primitive array.

      • shuffle

        public static void shuffle(char[] array)
        Shuffle method for a primitive char array. A specialized method is required as no method can accept any primitive array.
